parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.description: Set a seed for reproducibility. Random by default.

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Image to use as a starting frame for image to video generation.

parameters.description: Image to use as a starting frame for image to video generation.

parameters.name: model

param_schema.description: The model to use. 1.3b is faster, but 14b is better quality. A LORA either works with 1.3b or 14b, depending on the version it was trained on.

parameters.description: The model to use. 1.3b is faster, but 14b is better quality. A LORA either works with 1.3b or 14b, depending on the version it was trained on.

parameters.name: frames

param_schema.description: The number of frames to generate (1 to 5 seconds)

parameters.description: The number of frames to generate (1 to 5 seconds)

parameters.name: lora_url

param_schema.title: Lora Url
param_schema.description: Optional: The URL of a LORA to use

parameters.description: Optional: The URL of a LORA to use

parameters.name: fast_mode

param_schema.description: Speed up generation with different levels of acceleration. Faster modes may degrade quality somewhat. The speedup is dependent on the content, so different videos may see different speedups.

parameters.description: Speed up generation with different levels of acceleration. Faster modes may degrade quality somewhat. The speedup is dependent on the content, so different videos may see different speedups.

parameters.name: resolution

param_schema.description: The resolution of the video. 720p is not supported for 1.3b.

parameters.description: The resolution of the video. 720p is not supported for 1.3b.

parameters.name: aspect_ratio

param_schema.description: The aspect ratio of the video. 16:9, 9:16, 1:1, etc.

parameters.description: The aspect ratio of the video. 16:9, 9:16, 1:1, etc.

parameters.name: sample_steps

param_schema.title: Sample Steps
param_schema.description: Number of generation steps. Fewer steps means faster generation, at the expensive of output quality. 30 steps is sufficient for most prompts

parameters.description: Number of generation steps. Fewer steps means faster generation, at the expensive of output quality. 30 steps is sufficient for most prompts

parameters.name: negative_prompt

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.description: Things you do not want to see in your video

parameters.description: Things you do not want to see in your video

parameters.name: lora_strength_clip

param_schema.title: Lora Strength Clip
param_schema.description: Strength of the LORA applied to the CLIP model. 0.0 is no LORA.

parameters.description: Strength of the LORA applied to the CLIP model. 0.0 is no LORA.

parameters.name: sample_guide_scale

param_schema.title: Sample Guide Scale
param_schema.description: Higher guide scale makes prompt adherence better, but can reduce variation

parameters.description: Higher guide scale makes prompt adherence better, but can reduce variation

parameters.name: lora_strength_model

param_schema.title: Lora Strength Model
param_schema.description: Strength of the LORA applied to the model. 0.0 is no LORA.

parameters.description: Strength of the LORA applied to the model. 0.0 is no LORA.
